qas.question: Who published "Overseas Chinese rally against biased media coverage" on April 20?
Which publication published a report about the Chinese rallying against media bias?

context: On April 20, the <a0_0><a1_0>People's Daily<a1_0/><a0_0/> published a report entitled "Overseas Chinese rally against biased media coverage, for Olympics". It included images of Chinese people demonstrating in France, the United Kingdom, Germany and the United States. One picture showed Chinese demonstrators holding a sign which claimed, incorrectly, that the BBC had not reported on Jin Jing. The People's Daily quoted one protestor who claimed the "BBC on some of the recent events has misled the British public and the rest of the world by providing intensive untruthful reports and biased coverage."
